content:
Got it! So you're looking for a portable charger with a decent capacity to fully charge your phone multiple times, but still want it to be compact and lightweight.

Here are some recommendations for you:

1. **Anker PowerCore 20000**: This is a popular and highly-rated portable charger with a capacity of 20,000mAh. It's compact and lightweight, weighing only 12.5 oz (355g), and can charge your phone 4-6 times on a single charge. It has two USB ports, so you can charge two devices at once. ($45)
2. **Mophie Powerstation XXL**: This charger has a capacity of 20,800mAh and can charge your phone 5-7 times. It's a bit larger than the Anker, but still compact and lightweight (14.4 oz / 408g). It has two USB ports and a sleek design. ($60)
3. **Jackery Titan 20000**: This charger has a whopping capacity of 20,800mAh and can charge your phone 5-7 times. It's a bit larger than the other two, but still relatively compact (15.2 oz / 430g). It has two USB ports and a built-in LED flashlight. ($50)
4. **Aukey Power Bank 26800**: This charger has a massive capacity of 26,800mAh and can charge your phone 7-10 times! It's a bit larger and heavier (18.3 oz / 520g), but it's still portable and has three USB ports. ($40)

All of these options are high-quality and reliable, but the Anker PowerCore 20000 is a great balance of capacity and portability.

Before you make a final decision, consider the following:

* Check the charger's compatibility with your phone's charging speed. Some chargers support fast charging, while others may not.
* Look for reviews and ratings to ensure the charger is reliable and durable.
* Consider any additional features you might need, like a built-in cable or solar charging.

Which one of these options sounds most appealing to you?
